newsitem.title: POLAND: Bank Gdanski to sell Hevelius stake.
newsitem.headline: Bank Gdanski to sell Hevelius stake.

text.p: Polish Bank Gdanski SA wants to sell its stake in the firm managing the National Investment Fund No 2, Hevelius Management Sp z o.o., saying the move is necessary to protect its interests, the bank said on Tuesday.
Gdanski has a 40-percent stake in Hevelius.

It said in a statement it had already informed the supervisory board of the fund that it had started procedures necessary to sell the stake and would withdraw its representatives from the firm's supervisory board.
It did not give any other details and the bank's officials were not immediately available for comment.
